title: runtime: TestLockOSThread fails with GOMAXPROCS>1
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

GOMAXPROCS=2 strace -tt -v -f -s1000 -ostrace.log ./runtime.test -test.v
-test.run=TestLockOSThread

What do you see instead?

test fails

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

tip
Attachments: 1. strace.log (17641 bytes)
